name: Bad Zombie Elf v1.0
description:
Just a simple but fun game with eight levels so far! Tap the mouse or touchscreen monitor on any part of the landscape you want to go to and collect all the packages without letting the Zombie Elves steal your Santa Bag!

If all three of your Santa Bags are stolen, you turn into a Zombie Elf! But if you can find Santa's magical Hat, you power up and can destroy the Bad Zombie Elves for a short time. The Santa Hat also gives you a Santa Bag if you've lost one.
